column2: Switch paths from French -> English at the cost of losing cores on all of France \nWARNING TAKE CARE WITH THIS DECISION AS IT'S IRREVERSEABLE
Switch paths from English -> French at the cost of losing cores on all of the UK \nWARNING TAKE CARE WITH THIS DECISION AS IT'S IRREVERSEABLE
We can finally bridge the gap between the Somalis and us, it will bring a great boon to our empire.
We have finally earned the people's respect on what has been in law for decades, and they now respect our rule of both England and France.

Change the infamy decay here, click on each option to change it to that infamy decay! The listed amount on each option is what the new infamy decay will be.\nThis decay will change at the beginning of next month for all players, infamy decay above the base value will increase decay by the increased amount during war too (e.g. 0.35 will make war give 0.1 decay, 0.05 + 0.05).\nOptions which decrease the infamy decay will not affect war and wars will be stuck at 0.05 infamy decay.
Kicks all players which aren't currently allied to you
Gives you acces to all unsiege decisions
unally the player you want to unsiege and then press this decision, if you aoutomatically re-allied him it worked and the flag is set!
If you pres this decision every player nation with the unsiege flag gets automatically fully unsieged
Allows you to change the infamy decay at peace time (increases to the decay affect war time but not decreases) in deviations of 0.05 from 0.1-0.5, with the option of a 25.0 decay option.
Adds Bengali as an accepted culture
Adds Indo-Aryan as an accepted culture
Adds Aryan as an accepted culture
Adds Dravidian as an accepted culture
+0.1% Pop Growth in this province for 20 years, applies to all cored provinces that you currently own, mean time of 24 months
Developing Atomic Weapons of Mass Destruction
Gain Weapons of Mass Destruction after waiting 5 years for the research to finish to devistate your foes with.
Removes all reforms from China, players can pick to refuse this for no penalty, AI auto-accept.
Establish your authority over the lands under the prior protection of Burgundy.
Researches the finest troops in the world, allowing you to build them (you will have to wait till the next month tick to get the invention), able to define war in ways we barely even know.
